metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000031 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
SQL injection vulnerability in graph_templates_inputs.php in Cacti 0.8.8ballows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via thegraph_template_input_id and graph_template_id parameters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000031` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2').
